dcterms:creator: Ritesh Kumar
Aishwarya N. Reganti
Akshit Bhatia
Tushar Maheshwari
dcterms:description: TRAC (Trolling, Aggression and Cyberbullying) consists of 15,001 aggression-annotated Facebook Posts and Comments each in Hindi (Romanized and Devanagari script) and English for training and validation.
dcterms:title: TRAC Dataset

dcterms:creator: Moumita Basu
Saptarshi Ghosh
Kripabandhu Ghosh
dcterms:description: The FIRE IRMiDis Dataset is organized with the objective to extract factual or fact-checkable tweets during disasters, specifically tweets downloaded from Twitter during the Nepal earthquake in 2015.
dcterms:title: FIRE IRMiDis Dataset
